listBibl.head: This edition is based on the edition of the Ācārāṅganiryukti prepared by Willem Bollée. I (AO) received Professor Bollée’s files from Professor Thomas Oberlies, and I reformatted the text files and converted the encoding to Unicode (ISO-15919).

encodingDesc.p: This file contains the Prakrit text of the Āyāranijjuttī, which is written in 356 gāhās numbered continuously.
I have left Professor Bollée’s capitalization and marking of sandhi. However, I have introduced the following changes:

list.item: c'eva is changed systematically to cēva.
ng(h) and nk(h) are changed systematically to ṅg(h) ṅk(h).
